awd_titl_txt: Interlaboratory Testing Program for Laboratory Properties   of Rock, Round Two of Testing and Analysis
awd_abstract_narration: The Institute of Standards Research of ASTM will be                             conducting an interlaboratory testing program for rock                          properties. Specifically, funding is sought for purchasing,                     transporting, logging, cutting, coring and distributing                         samples of the rocks to be tested. The overall project                          objectives are: to obtain reliable estimates of precision                       of selected properties of rock to be incorporated into                          existing standards; identification of desirable                                 modifications; and dissemination of information collected                       among parties of interest in industry, government and                           academe, and between producers and users.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.inst_name: American Society For Testing and Materials
